Discover the Difference

Talent Acquisition & Staff Augmentation from a Respectfully Professional Company.

Respectfully Professional Process

The goal of the Respectfully Professional Process is to provide Quality over Quantity and Relationships over Transactions – ultimately saving time for everyone. We achieve this goal by gaining a deep understanding of what both the client and the job seeker are looking for while treating everyone the way that we want to be treated. The result is that we deliver a solution that works for everyone.

Our Solutions

RX2 Solutions provides National Staff Augmentation and Talent Acquisition Solutions on a retained and
contingent basis. Our capabilities include Project Staffing, Contract, Contract-to-hire, and Direct Hire.

What Our Clients and Candidates Say

Clients
Candidates

Steve Ehrlich

Manager of Technology

Ross is a pleasure to work with. He listens to want I need, and works from there. Often vendors try to "sell" you what they have, not what you need. Ross makes sure he listens to want you really need, help you refine what you really need, and then strives to provide you with what you need. I strongly recommend Ross!

David Phelan

IT Leader

Ross is on my short list of technology recruiters who break the mold for the industry. He's consistently patient, polite, informative, helpful, and easy to work with. Ross listens well to what's important to meet my needs, and doesn't waste my time with people who don't fit. He's open to flexible arrangements to land candidates, and clearly positively influences his team. I wish all agencies were as great to work with as RX2 Solutions, and Ross is a strong representation of their vanguard.

Jerry Alan Goldman

Gloval IT Director of eBusiness

It's been a pleasure getting to know Ross over the past year or so. Even thought we have never been able to do business together, I consider him a class act. His demeanor and attitude are very professional and I would recommend him to anyone who is looking for a trustworthy, engaging, professional, IT recruiter.

Deighton Liverpool

CIO Global Information Technology

I've known Ross for several years and he has become one of my go-to IT recruiters. I can depend on Ross for Integrity, dependability, and delivery. It has been a pleasure working with Ross and his team. I would highly recommend Ross for your IT staffing needs.

Thomas Hofacker

IS Project Manager

I would recommend Ross to anyone looking for a hard working IT recruiter who they can trust. I had the pleasure of working with Ross as both a hiring manager and a job seeker and he always listened to what I wanted, set realistic expectations, and followed up when I asked him to. The candidates that he sourced were excellent and I would recommend him to anyone who has a contract or a direct hire need for their IT team.

Keith D. Peters

Recruitment Specialist at Visiting Nurse Service of New York

Ross is a strong professional that was very involved with finding talent for my organization. Ross stayed engaged and really new our needs. I would recommend using him for bringing in great IT candidates.

Igor Beiu

Cloud / DevOps / Automation / Serverless

Ross is a highly skilled recruiter who can grasp the requirements for the personality and the skill set of an ideal candidate and deliver right on it. Ross has helped us on several occasions and the candidates he helped bring in were a very close match. I would recommend using his services without any hesitation.

Merle T. Gibbs, SHRM-CP, PHR, MSHR

HR Business Partner - HCA Integrated Lines of Business, West FL Division

Ross has been a valuable partner to the HR and IT Departments of the AACR in finding and identifying the right talent for the numerous IT positions that were hard to fill. He was sensitive to our needs and was always eager to work with us and our limited budget. He has great follow-up skills and a very positive attitude. He's a pleasure to work with.

Paul Mosenson

Sports App Founder

Ross is very helpful giving advice on being in transition and job hunting strategies for my daughter. I recommend him for anyone seeking recruitment services.

Michael DeLuca

Technology Leader

It says a lot about a person to help a stranger when you know they’re up against the odds as they enter the market of looking for a job. That’s exactly what Ross did for me and I appreciate the way he stepped up. It’s one thing to be a consummate professional but it’s another to also be a good human. He took time out of his day to offer me a rewrite of my resume and I’m very grateful to him for doing so. Keep doing what you do, Ross.

Angelo J. Valletta

C-Level Executive

I originally met Ross via a referral by a peer who had done business with him. I had no need for his services at the time, and soon realized that Ross was the consummate professional. He followed up professionally when he promised to do so and has never given me the "hard sell". When I started searching for a new opportunity, I was comfortable with reaching out to Ross in confidence. He kept everything confidential and only sent my resume to companies that I approved. I would suggest to anyone who is looking for a trustworthy IT recruiter should give Ross and his team a chance to assist. They have always done well for me personally.

Marnee Klein

Director of Information Technology

Ross' creative communication methods made RX2Solutions stand out to me against all the other recruiters who had contacted me over the years. It was an absolute pleasure working with him and his team to acquire my latest position; they made the job search, interview, and compensation negotiation process infinitely easier.
